import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import { withRouter } from 'react-router-dom'; import DatePicker from "react-datepicker"; import {submitRoom} from '../../redux/rooms/rooms.action'; import FormInput from '../form-input/form-input.component'; import CustomButton from '../custom-button/custom-button.component'; import FileBase from 'react-file-base64'; import "react-datepicker/dist/react-datepicker.css"; import './post.styles.scss'; const Post= ({onCancel, user, submitRoom}) => { const [roomInfo, setRoomInfo] = useState({ title:'', area:'', describe: '', price: 0, available: new Date(), roomSize: '', roomType: 'privateRoom', bath: 'share', availableSmoke: true, landry: '', parking: true, pet: false, img: '', userInfo: { userId: user.id, userName: user.displayName, userEmail: user.email } }); const postHandleSubmit = event => { event.preventDefault(); console.log(roomInfo); submitRoom(roomInfo, onCancel); }; const handleInput = () => { setRoomInfo({ ...roomInfo, pet: !roomInfo.pet }); }; const handleDate = date => { setRoomInfo({ ...roomInfo, available: date }) }; const handleChange = event => { let { value, name } = event.target; if(value === 'true') { value = true; } else if(value === 'false') { value = false; } setRoomInfo({...roomInfo, [name]: value }); }; const getBaseFile = (files) =>{ // create a local readable base64 instance of an image setRoomInfo({ ...roomInfo, img: files.base64.toString() }); let imageObj = { imageName: "base-image-" + Date.now(), imageData: files.base64.toString() }; } return (
